cnd21:1.1: **Idamavoca bhagavā magadhesu viharanto pāsāṇake cetiye, paricārakasoḷasānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ ajjhiṭṭho puṭṭho puṭṭho pañhaṃ byākāsi.**
cnd21:2.4: **Magadhesu viharanto**ti magadhanāmake janapade viharanto iriyanto vattento pālento yapento yāpento.
cnd21:2.7: **Paricārakasoḷasānaṃ brāhmaṇānan**ti piṅgiyo brāhmaṇo bāvarissa brāhmaṇassa paddho paddhacaro paricārako sisso.
cnd21:2.10: Atha vā te soḷasa brāhmaṇā buddhassa bhagavato paddhā paddhacarā paricārakā sissāti—
cnd21:3.3: **Puṭṭho puṭṭho**ti puṭṭho puṭṭho pucchito pucchito yācito yācito ajjhesito ajjhesito pasādito pasādito.
cnd21:3.4: **Pañhaṃ byākāsī**ti pañhaṃ byākāsi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīākāsi pakāsesīti—
cnd21:4.1: “Idamavoca bhagavā magadhesu viharanto pāsāṇake cetiye, paricārakasoḷasānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ ajjhiṭṭho puṭṭho puṭṭho pañhaṃ byākāsī”ti.
cnd21:5.1: **Ekamekassa cepi pañhassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjeyya, gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāraṃ.**
cnd21:6.1: **Ekamekassa cepi pañhassā**ti ekamekassa cepi ajitapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi tissametteyyapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi puṇṇakapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi mettagūpañhassa, ekamekassa cepi dhotakapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi upasīvapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi nandakapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi hemakapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi todeyyapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi kappapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi jatukaṇṇipañhassa, ekamekassa cepi bhadrāvudhapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi udayapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi posālapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi mogharājapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi piṅgiyapañhassāti—
cnd21:7.1: **Atthamaññāya dhammamaññāyā**ti sveva pañho dhammo, visajjanaṃ atthoti atthaṃ aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti—
cnd21:7.3: **Dhammamaññāyā**ti dhammaṃ aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti—
cnd21:7.6: **Dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjeyyā**ti sammāpaṭipadaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṃ anvatthapaṭipadaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjeyyāti—
cnd21:7.8: **Gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāran**ti jarāmaraṇassa pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ.
cnd21:7.9: Yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.
cnd21:7.10: **Gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāran**ti jarāmaraṇassa pāraṃ gaccheyya, pāraṃ adhigaccheyya, pāraṃ adhiphasseyya, pāraṃ sacchikareyyāti—
cnd21:7.13: Pāraṃ pāpenti pāraṃ sampāpenti pāraṃ samanupāpenti, jarāmaraṇassa taraṇāya saṃvattantīti—
cnd21:8.6: **Pārāyananteva adhivacanan**ti pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ …pe… nirodho nibbānaṃ.
cnd21:8.9: **Adhivacanan**ti saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpoti—
cnd21:9.1: “Ekamekassa cepi pañhassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjeyya, gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāraṃ.
cnd21:13.3: **Buddho**ti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāvaṃ.
cnd21:13.5: Bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho, sabbaññutāya buddho, sabbadassāvitāya buddho, abhiññeyyatāya buddho, visavitāya buddho, khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho, nirupalepasaṅkhātena buddho, ekantavītarāgoti buddho, ekantavītadosoti buddho, ekantavītamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho, ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddho, eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddho, abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhāti buddho.
cnd21:13.6: **Buddho**ti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ na pitarā kataṃ na bhātarā kataṃ na bhaginiyā kataṃ na mittāmaccehi kataṃ na ñātisālohitehi kataṃ na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṃ na devatāhi kataṃ.
cnd21:13.7: Vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutañāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ buddhoti.
cnd21:13.8: **Ete buddhaṃ upāgacchun**ti ete buddhaṃ upāgamiṃsu upasaṅkamiṃsu payirupāsiṃsu paripucchiṃsu paripañhiṃsūti—
cnd21:14.2: Sīlasaṃvaropi caraṇaṃ, indriyasaṃvaropi caraṇaṃ, bhojane mattaññutāpi caraṇaṃ, jāgariyānuyogopi caraṇaṃ, sattapi saddhammā caraṇaṃ, cattāripi jhānāni caraṇaṃ.
cnd21:14.3: **Sampannacaraṇan**ti sampannacaraṇaṃ seṭṭhacaraṇaṃ viseṭṭhacaraṇaṃ pāmokkhacaraṇaṃ uttamacaraṇaṃ pavaracaraṇaṃ.
cnd21:14.4: **Isī**ti isi bhagavā mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti isi …pe… mahesakkhehi vā sattehi esito gavesito pariyesito—
cnd21:14.5: “kahaṃ buddho, kahaṃ bhagavā, kahaṃ devadevo kahaṃ narāsabho”ti—
cnd21:15.3: **Nipuṇe pañhe**ti gambhīre duddase duranubodhe sante paṇīte atakkāvacare nipuṇe paṇḍitavedanīye pañheti—
cnd21:16.2: **Buddho**ti yo so bhagavā …pe… sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ buddhoti.
cnd21:16.3: **Seṭṭhan**ti aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ viseṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ buddhaṃ upāgamuṃ upāgamiṃsu upasaṅkamiṃsu payirupāsiṃsu paripucchiṃsu paripañhiṃsūti—
cnd21:19.3: **Buddho**ti yo so bhagavā …pe… sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ buddhoti.
cnd21:19.4: **Pabyākāsī**ti tesaṃ buddho pabyākāsi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīakāsi pakāsesīti—
cnd21:20.2: **Pañhaṃ puṭṭho**ti pañhaṃ puṭṭho pucchito yācito ajjhesito pasādito.
cnd21:20.3: **Yathātathan**ti yathā ācikkhitabbaṃ tathā ācikkhi, yathā desitabbaṃ tathā desesi, yathā paññapetabbaṃ tathā paññapesi, yathā paṭṭhapetabbaṃ tathā paṭṭhapesi, yathā vivaritabbaṃ tathā vivari, yathā vibhajitabbaṃ tathā vibhaji, yathā uttānīkātabbaṃ tathā uttānīakāsi, yathā pakāsitabbaṃ tathā pakāsesīti—
cnd21:21.1: **Pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇenā**ti pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena ācikkhanena desanena paññapanena paṭṭhapanena vivaraṇena vibhajanena uttānīkammena pakāsanenāti—
cnd21:22.2: **Tosesī**ti tosesi vitosesi pasādesi ārādhesi attamane akāsi.
cnd21:22.4: **Munī**ti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ …pe… saṅgajālamaticca so munīti—
cnd21:25.3: **Tositā**ti tositā vitositā pasāditā ārādhitā attamanā katāti—
cnd21:25.6: maṃsacakkhunāpi cakkhumā, dibbacakkhunāpi cakkhumā, paññācakkhunāpi cakkhumā, buddhacakkhunāpi cakkhumā, samantacakkhunāpi cakkhumā.
cnd21:26.2: **Buddho**ti yo so bhagavā …pe… sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ buddhoti.
cnd21:26.4: So gotamo gottena, bhagavāpi gotamo gottena, bhagavā sūriyassa gottañātako gottabandhu.
cnd21:27.1: **Brahmacariyamacariṃsū**ti brahmacariyaṃ vuccati asaddhammasamāpattiyā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī viramaṇaṃ akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto.
cnd21:27.2: Api ca nippariyāyavasena brahmacariyaṃ vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ—
cnd21:27.3: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
cnd21:28.1: **Varapaññassa santike**ti varapaññassa aggapaññassa seṭṭhapaññassa viseṭṭhapaññassa pāmokkhapaññassa uttamapaññassa pavarapaññassa.
cnd21:32.4: **Yathā buddhena desitan**ti yathā buddhena ācikkhitaṃ desitaṃ paññapitaṃ paṭṭhapitaṃ vivaritaṃ vibhajitaṃ uttānīkataṃ pakāsitanti—
cnd21:33.1: **Tathā yo paṭipajjeyyā**ti sammāpaṭipadaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṃ anvatthapaṭipadaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjeyyāti—
cnd21:34.1: **Gacche pāraṃ apārato**ti pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ …pe… nirodho nibbānaṃ;
cnd21:34.2: apāraṃ vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca.
cnd21:34.3: **Gacche pāraṃ apārato**ti apārato pāraṃ gaccheyya, pāraṃ adhigaccheyya, pāraṃ phasseyya, pāraṃ sacchikareyyāti—
cnd21:37.1: **Apārā pāraṃ gaccheyyā**ti apāraṃ vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca;
cnd21:37.4: **Apārā pāraṃ gaccheyyā**ti apārā pāraṃ gaccheyya, pāraṃ adhigaccheyya, pāraṃ phasseyya, pāraṃ sacchikareyyāti—
cnd21:38.1: **Bhāvento maggamuttaman**ti maggamuttamaṃ vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ—
cnd21:38.3: **Maggamuttaman**ti maggaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ viseṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ.
cnd21:41.1: **Pāraṃ gamanāyā**ti pāraṃ gamanāya pāraṃ sampāpanāya pāraṃ samanupāpanāya jarāmaraṇassa taraṇāyāti—
cnd21:42.3: Pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ …pe… nirodho nibbānaṃ.
